ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let free = source.getVariable() == "1"
let data = JSON.parse(result).data
let bid = baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]
let chapterList = []
data['vs'].forEach(list => {
  chapterList.push({
    name: String(list.vN),
    voltype: true
  })
  list['cs'].forEach(chapter => {
    let isVip = chapter.sS!="1" && !free ? " ":""
    let href = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/${bid}/${chapter.id}/`
    let url = list.hS == true || free ? `${href},{'webView': true}` : href
    chapterList.push({
      name: String(isVip+chapter.cN).trim().replace(/^(\d+)(?![\s\d卷部章节回.])/, '$1 ').replace(/\s+/g, " "),
      url: url,
      info: `更新时间: ${chapter.uT} 字数: ${chapter.cnt}`,
      voltype: false
    })
  })
})
chapterList
</js>

bookSourceComment:
搜索关键字格式
─────
完全格式：书名#作者$网站
简化格式1：书名$网站
简化格式2：书名#作者
简化格式3：书名
格式说明：例如，搜索“斗破苍穹#天蚕土豆$www.qidian.com”将会在“www.qidian.com”这个网站中搜索书名为斗破苍穹、作者为天蚕土豆的书籍

loginUrl:
<js>
function login(){
userInfo=source.getLoginInfoMap()
java.log(userInfo)
UNE=userInfo['手机号码/邮箱号']
PWD=userInfo['密码']
url="https://afdian.net/api/passport/login,";
SU=source.getKey()
body={
  "account": String(UNE),
  "password": String(PWD),
  "mp_token": -1
}
option={
'method': 'POST',
'body': JSON.stringify(body)
}

url=url+JSON.stringify(option)
token=java.ajax(url).match(/"auth_token":"([^"]+)"/)[1]

Cookie={
	"Cookie":"auth_token="+token
	}
header = JSON.stringify(Cookie)
source.putLoginHeader(header)
}
</js>

ruleContent.content: if(baseUrl.match(/album-info/)){ text="↓复制下面网址，在书架选择◎添加网址◎，粘贴网址，即可阅读本书↓\n"+baseUrl+"\n简介："+JSON.parse(result).data.album.content }else if(baseUrl.match(/post_id/)){ json=JSON.parse(result) pics=json.data.post.pics; video=json.data.post.video?"视频链接："+json.data.post.video:"" preview_text=json.data.post.preview_text?json.data.post.preview_text:"" imgs=""; for(i in pics){ imgs+='\n' } result=json.data.post.content+imgs+video; result!=""?result:preview_text+"\n💰"+json.data.post.min_price+"\n"+json.data.post.has_right_errMsg }else{ result="↓↓复制下面文字，编辑书源，添加至发现规则↓↓\n"+book.name+"的作品集::"+baseUrl.replace(/page=1/,'page={\{page}}') } ##class="fr-fic fr-dib".*?"\[object Object\]"

ruleContent.content: header={"Referer":baseUrl}; headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}; //获取章节位置 index=parseInt(chapter.index); index=index+1; num=parseInt(book.totalChapterNum); index=num-index; //画质可选low middle high var img_ext = "-aym.middle.webp"; var pic = "https://mhpic." var html =""; json=JSON.parse(result); comic_chapter= json.data.comic_chapter; var end_num = comic_chapter[index].end_num; var rule=comic_chapter[index].rule; chapter_domain=comic_chapter[index].chapter_domain; for( let i = 1;i <= end_num; i++) { let url = pic + chapter_domain +rule.replace(/\$\$/g,i) +img_ext; html += '\n'; } result = html

ruleContent.content: //获取图像token function getImageToken(path){ let a={ urls: '[\"'+path+"@748w.jpg"+'\"]' }, b={ "method": "POST", "body": JSON.stringify(a), "headers": {"Referer":"https://manga.bilibili.com/mc"+java.get("bid")+"/"+java.get("epid")+"?from=manga_detail"} } URL="https://manga.bilibili.com/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/ImageToken?device=pc&platform=web,"+JSON.stringify(b); java.setContent(java.ajax(URL)); url=java.getString("$..url"); token=java.getString("$..token"); return url+"?token="+token } b={ "headers": {"Referer":"https://manga.bilibili.com/mc"+java.get("bid")+"/"+java.get("epid")+"?from=manga_detail"} } //加了不会有水印?? java.getStringList("$.data.images[*].path").toArray().map(path=>{ return '' }).join("\n")

ruleContent.content: //获取章节位置 index=parseInt(chapter.index); index=index+1; num=parseInt(book.totalChapterNum); index=num-index; //画质可选low middle high var img_ext = "-smh.middle.webp"; var pic = "https://mhpic.manhualang.com" var html =""; json=JSON.parse(result); comic_chapter= json.data.comic_chapter; var end_num = comic_chapter[index].end_num; var rule=comic_chapter[index].rule; chapter_domain=comic_chapter[index].chapter_domain; header={"Referer":baseUrl}; headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}; for( let i = 1;i <= end_num; i++) { let url = pic +rule.replace(/\$\$/g,i) +img_ext; html += '\n'; } result = html

ruleContent.content: //获取图像token function getImageToken(path){ let a={ urls: '[\"'+path+"@748w.jpg"+'\"]' }, b={ "method": "POST", "body": JSON.stringify(a), "headers": {"Referer":"https://manga.bilibili.com/mc"+java.get("bid")+"/"+java.get("epid")+"?from=manga_detail"} } URL="https://manga.bilibili.com/twirp/comic.v1.Comic/ImageToken?device=pc&platform=web,"+JSON.stringify(b); java.setContent(java.ajax(URL)); url=java.getString("$..url"); token=java.getString("$..token"); return url+"?token="+token } b={ "headers": {"Referer":"https://manga.bilibili.com/mc"+java.get("bid")+"/"+java.get("epid")+"?from=manga_detail"} } //加了不会有水印?? java.getStringList("$.data.images[*].path").toArray().map(path=>{ return '' }).join("\n")
